name: Between Room (Gamejam Prototype)
description:
This game prototype for a puzzle platformer that I made for the Indie Tales Jam (my first game jam!). This is my first ever published game and my first time trying out Godot in contrast to other software. I plan to continue working on it in the near future, as I needed slightly more time to flesh the idea out.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space/Y - jump

Shift - Focus

Shift + Arrow keys - Teleport

Hope that I may have peaked your curiosity, even if slightly. Everyone has a place to start out!
